title: Skullcandy Hesh ANC Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones with Charging Cable, 22 Hr Battery, Microphone, Works with iPhone Android and Bluetooth Devices - True Black
article_markdown:
# Introduction

In today's fast-paced world, finding a pair of headphones that combine comfort, sound quality, and effective noise cancellation can be a challenge. The Skullcandy Hesh ANC Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones in True Black stand out as a compelling option for music lovers, commuters, and anyone seeking a more immersive audio experience. With advanced features like active noise cancellation, impressive battery life, and a sleek design, these headphones are designed to enhance your listening experience while keeping you connected to your devices.

## Exceptional Sound Quality

At the heart of the Hesh ANC headphones is a powerful set of 40mm drivers that deliver time-proven sound quality. Users can expect rich, deep bass and a dynamic range that brings music, movies, and calls to life. Whether you're enjoying your favorite playlist or engaging in a video conference, the audio clarity remains consistently excellent. The built-in microphone ensures that your voice comes through clearly, making these headphones a great choice for both casual listening and professional use.

## Active Noise Cancellation

One of the standout features of the Hesh ANC headphones is their active noise cancellation (ANC) technology. With four microphones working together, these headphones effectively block out ambient noise, allowing you to focus on what matters most—your audio. Many users have praised the ANC feature for its ability to create an immersive listening environment, whether at home, on public transport, or in bustling cafés. While some ambient sounds may still be faintly heard, the overall noise reduction is significant, making it easier to enjoy your music without distractions.

## Impressive Battery Life

Battery life is a crucial factor for any wireless headphones, and the Hesh ANC does not disappoint. With up to 22 hours of playtime on a single charge, these headphones are perfect for long days of use. If you find yourself running low on battery, a quick 10-minute charge provides an additional three hours of listening time. This feature is particularly beneficial for users who are always on the go and need a reliable audio companion.

## Comfort and Design

Comfort is key when it comes to headphones, especially for extended listening sessions. The Hesh ANC headphones feature plush ear cushions that provide a soft, comfortable fit without exerting unnecessary pressure. The adjustable headband ensures a snug fit for various head sizes, making them suitable for everyone. Additionally, their lightweight design makes them easy to wear for hours on end, whether you're working, relaxing, or commuting.

## User Experiences

Customer feedback highlights the Hesh ANC headphones' strengths and areas for improvement. Many users have expressed their satisfaction with the sound quality and noise cancellation capabilities, noting that they significantly enhance daily routines. The headphones are particularly praised for their comfort, with several users mentioning they can wear them for long periods without discomfort. 

However, some reviews mention that while the ANC feature is effective, it may allow some sounds to seep through, particularly voices. Users appreciate the "aware mode," which allows them to hear conversations without removing the headphones. Additionally, while the battery life is generally praised, a few users noted that the battery drains faster when ANC is activated.

## Conclusion

The Skullcandy Hesh ANC Over-Ear Noise Cancelling Wireless Headphones offer an impressive combination of sound quality, comfort, and effective noise cancellation at a reasonable price point. With features like a long-lasting battery, quick charging capabilities, and a reliable Bluetooth connection, these headphones are well-suited for a variety of users—from music enthusiasts to professionals needing clear audio for calls. Overall, the Hesh ANC headphones are a fantastic choice for anyone looking to elevate their listening experience while enjoying the freedom of wireless technology.
pros: Excellent sound quality with deep bass and clear audio across various media.
Effective active noise cancellation that significantly reduces ambient noise.
Long battery life of up to 22 hours with quick charging capabilities.
Comfortable design with plush ear cushions and adjustable headband for extended use.
Reliable Bluetooth connectivity that pairs easily with iPhone and Android devices.
